ðŸ“– Summary: YTConverter is a Python-based CLI tool for downloading and converting YouTube videos. It leverages yt-dlp and ffmpeg to offer features like format conversion, subtitle downloads, playlist support, and customizable download paths, all through an interactive terminal interface.
